data.comment: The match is underway in London.
Arsenal awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 1, Arsenal's Gabriel Martinelli breaks free at Emirates Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Chelsea at Emirates Stadium.
Arsenal have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
In the minute 4, Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Chelsea in their own half.
Corner awarded to Arsenal.
Throw-in for Arsenal close to the penalty box.
In the minute 6, Alexandre Lacazette (Arsenal) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Chelsea defenders.
Free kick for Chelsea in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal goal kick.
In the minute 8, Arsenal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Chelsea get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal's half?
Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Chelsea.
In the minute 13, Mason Mount for Chelsea gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Michael Oliver awards Arsenal a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Arsenal in their own half.
Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Chelsea in their own half.
Pablo Mari (Arsenal) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 17, Free kick for Chelsea in the half of Arsenal.
Throw-in for Arsenal at Emirates Stadium.
Michael Oliver signals a Arsenal throw-in in Chelsea's half.
In the minute 20, Chelsea have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
Corner awarded to Chelsea.
Kurt Zouma (Chelsea) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 22, Arsenal have a goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Arsenal in London.
Ball goes out of play for a Chelsea goal kick.
In the minute 24, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Arsenal push forward at Emirates Stadium and Granit Xhaka gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Chelsea defence.
Free kick Arsenal.
In the minute 26, Arsenal have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
Arsenal to take a throw-in in Chelsea territory.
Throw-in for Arsenal in the half of Chelsea.
In the minute 27, Michael Oliver signals a Arsenal throw-in in Chelsea's half.
Free kick for Chelsea in their own half.
Chelsea to take a throw-in in Arsenal territory.
In the minute 29, Tammy Abraham (Chelsea) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Chelsea.
Chelsea are coming forward and Reece James gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 30, It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
Chelsea's Mason Mount gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Michael Oliver awards Arsenal a goal kick.
In the minute 31, Can Arsenal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Chelsea's half?
Corner awarded to Arsenal.
Arsenal have been given a penalty at Emirates Stadium...
In the minute 34, Goal! Arsenal take a 1-0 lead thanks to a Alexandre Lacazette spot-kick..
In London, Hector Bellerin of Arsenal is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Arsenal have a goal kick.
In the minute 37, Goal kick for Chelsea at Emirates Stadium.
Chelsea awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 40, Michael Oliver awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Chelsea in their own half.
In London Chelsea attack through Timo Werner. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 42, Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal goal kick.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Arsenal close to the penalty box.
Goal! Granit Xhaka extends Arsenal's lead to 2-0.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Arsenal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
At Emirates Stadium the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
The first-half is over at Emirates Stadium.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Chelsea in the half of Arsenal.
Jorginho is replacing Mateo Kovacic for Chelsea at Emirates Stadium.
Frank Lampard (Chelsea) is making a second substitution, with Callum Hudson-Odoi replacing Timo Werner.
Chelsea have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
Arsenal have a goal kick.
In the minute 49, Michael Oliver signals a Arsenal throw-in in Chelsea's half.
Emile Smith-Rowe for the home team is judged to be offside.
Can Chelsea capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Arsenal's half?
In the minute 51, Christian Pulisic (Chelsea) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in Arsenal.
Chelsea awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 54, Michael Oliver awards the home team a throw-in.
Great finish from Bukayo Saka to give Arsenal a 3-0 lead.
That's a fine assist from Emile Smith-Rowe.
In the minute 58, Corner awarded to Chelsea.
Chelsea's Kurt Zouma attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
In the minute 59, In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Chelsea's Mason Mount breaks free at Emirates Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Arsenal at Emirates Stadium.
In the minute 61, Arsenal drives forward and Gabriel Martinelli gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Chelsea's Christian Pulisic gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Arsenal defender.
Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Arsenal in their own half.
In the minute 63, Arsenal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Arsenal's Gabriel Martinelli is on target but unsuccessful.
Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Chelsea in their own half.
In the minute 65, The home team have replaced Emile Smith-Rowe with Joseph Willock. This is the first substitution made today by Mikel Arteta.
Free kick for Chelsea in the half of Arsenal.
Bukayo Saka (Arsenal) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 67, Joseph Willock for Arsenal gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Michael Oliver awards Chelsea a goal kick.
Free kick for Chelsea in their own half.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Arsenal at Emirates Stadium.
Arsenal to take a throw-in in Chelsea territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Chelsea get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal's half?
In the minute 71, Mikel Arteta is making the team's second substitution at Emirates Stadium with Nicolas Pepe replacing Gabriel Martinelli.
Arsenal awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 73, Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Arsenal.
Thiago Silva (Chelsea) has received a yellow card from Michael Oliver.
In the minute 74, Chelsea have a goal kick.
Kai Havertz is on a sub for N`Golo Kante for Chelsea.
Chelsea have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
Chelsea attack but Thiago Silva's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 75, Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal goal kick.
Throw-in for Arsenal in the half of Chelsea.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Pablo Mari.
In the minute 80, Tammy Abraham (Chelsea) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Michael Oliver awards Arsenal a goal kick.
Pablo Mari has recovered and rejoins the match in London.
In the minute 81, Can Arsenal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Chelsea's half?
Ball safe as Arsenal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 83, Alexandre Lacazette of Arsenal smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Kieran Tierney is booked for the home team.
Corner awarded to Arsenal.
Great shot from Arsenal's Mohamed Elneny but he is denied by the crossbar.
In the minute 84, Arsenal pushes forward through Rob Holding, whose finish on goal is saved.
Arsenal have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
Goal! Tammy Abraham pulls one back for Chelsea to make it 3-1.
In the minute 85, Great play from Callum Hudson-Odoi to set up the goal.
Arsenal have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
Corner awarded to Chelsea.
In the minute 89, Michael Oliver signals a Chelsea throw-in in Arsenal's half.
Christian Pulisic (Chelsea) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
Penalty! Michael Oliver points to the spot, great chance for Chelsea...
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Jorginho (Chelsea) had a chance from the penalty spot but missed!
Goal kick for Arsenal at Emirates Stadium.
Throw-in for Arsenal in their own half.
Free kick Arsenal.
Michael Oliver awards Chelsea a goal kick.
Christian Pulisic gets his shot on target but fails to score for Chelsea.
Throw-in Chelsea.
Chelsea drive upfield and Callum Hudson-Odoi gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Arsenal defender.
Chelsea have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
Corner awarded to Chelsea.
It's 3-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Shkodran Mustafi is replacing Alexandre Lacazette for the home team.
